title: Vaa Ponmayile Song Lyrics Poonthalir
stanzas:
Vaa pon mayile
nenjam yaekkathil thavikkudhu
endrum nee indri naanillai
naan indri nee illai kanmani...

kaniye manam mayanga mayanga
varuvaai suvai peruga peruga
ilamaiyin naliname
inimaiyin uruvam

Vaa pon mayile
nenjam yaekkathil thavikkudhu
endrum nee indri naanillai
naan indri nee illai kanmani...

azhage sugam valara valara
ninaive dhinam pazhaga pazhaga
urimaiyil azhaikkiren
uyiyile kalandhu magizha vaa

Vaa pon mayile
nenjam yaekkathil thavikkudhu
endrum nee indri naanillai
naan indri nee illai kanmani...
